description.value: Your eidolon gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tremorsense] as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. If aquatic, it gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Wavesense] as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet instead. If amphibious, it gains both.
